metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12626 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4. A CSRF attack can cause an authenticated user to be logged out because POST was not considered.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
roundcube-core - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
